title: Request Public Meeting Minutes
description: A citizen wants a copy of the approved minutes from last month's school board meeting.

tasks.description: Identify the specific meeting and date the citizen is requesting.
Search the public records portal for the requested minutes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent finds the approved minutes for the specified meeting.

tasks.description: Provide a copy of the minutes to the citizen.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent provides a link to download the PDF of the minutes.
